txt.en: The fox is feeling better now
Rhosgobel: Calming the Wilds
Calm the upset fox
Calm the upset deer

'There are many threats still on the edges of the Vales. I am concerned about the wild and kind creatures of the wood. They are restless and could use some reassurance that there are many who will look out for them and come to their aid in times of need.'
Calm the upset squirrel
Calm the upset shrew
Calm the upset rabbit
'You have helped a great deal. There are still more animals in the Vales who will need our assistance soon enough.'
Radagast can be found in Rhosgobel.\n\nYou should talk to Radagast.
Many wild animals in the Vales of Anduin are upset and could use a kind and calming hand.
Upset animals can be found throughout the Vales of Anduin.\n\nYou should calm upset animals.
The aurochs is feeling better now

Calm the upset aurochs
Talk to Radagast
The rabbit is feeling better now
The shrew is feeling better now
'There is much to do in the Vales, my friend.'
The squirrel is feeling better now
'You have done much to aid my efforts.'
The deer is feeling better now
